songs.title: Don’t Wanna Dance Alone (Acoustic)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Lauren]
Calling all my girls
There's an SOS tonight, let's have some fun yeah
One hundred percent
Every single trace of my weekdays are gone, yeah

[Pre-Chorus 1: Normani]
There's gotta be a million faces up in this room, room
But the only one who gets my attention is you, you

[Chorus: Lauren and Camila & (All)]
I got my best (oh, oh) on
And I feel like dancing all night (night) long
Nothing's gonna stop me, you're what I (I, I) want
So baby come and get me
Cause I don't wanna dance alone
Oh it's been so (so) long, thinking 'bout the feeling
Of your (your) arms (arms) wrapped around my body
That's what I (I, I) want (want)
So baby come and get me
Cause I don't wanna dance alone

[Verse 2: Camila]
Out on the floor
I can feel you staring at me across the room, oh
Whatcha waiting for?
All I want is you so come and make your move, oh

[Pre-Chorus 2: Dinah]
I see a million silhouettes dancing in this room, room
I wanna be the one who gets the attention from you, oh

[Chorus: Lauren and Camila & (All)]
I got my best (oh, oh) on
And I feel like dancing all night (night) long
Nothing's gonna stop me, you're what I (I, I) want
So baby come and get me
Cause I don't wanna dance alone
Oh it's been so (so) long, thinking 'bout the feeling
Of your (your) arms (arms) wrapped around my body
That's what I (I, I) want (want)
So baby come and get me
Cause I don't wanna dance alone

[Bridge: Ally &  Ally and Lauren]
If you come in close then I won't say no
Baby all I want is you
If you move too slow then you'll never know
All the things that we could do
If you come in close then I won't say no,
Baby all I want is you
If you move too slow then you'll never know
All the things that we could do

[Chorus: Lauren and Camila & (All) & (Camila)]
I got my best (oh, oh) on (I got my best on)
And I feel like dancing (like dancing oh) all night (night) long (all night long)
Nothing's gonna stop me, you're what I (I, I) want (You're what I want)
So baby come and get me
Cause I don't wanna dance alone (Oh, oh, oh)
It's been so (so) long (it's been so long), thinking 'bout the feeling
Of your (your) arms (arms) (your arms) wrapped around my body
That's what I (I, I) want (want) so baby come and get me
Cause I don't wanna dance alone

[Outro: Camila]
Don't let me dance alone
I don't wanna dance alone
